content:
Keper and his
 special nursery (Level
 
 2) 
 Ursula Nafula and Nina Orange
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is the story of 
 
 Keper and his 
 
 nursery for 
 
 orphaned animals. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Last month was a busy 
 
 month at the nursery. 
 
 
 
 One-year-old Nomsa 
 
 was the first to arive. 
 
 She was thin and sad. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But son, Nomsa 
 
 got stronger. 
 
 
 
 She began to play 
 
 with the other animals. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On another day 
 
 that month, 
 
 a helicopter 
 
 landed at 
 
 the nursery. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 In the helicopter 
 
 was a smal elephant 
 
 under big blanket. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ndiwa was under 
 
 the blanket. 
 
 
 
 He was five days’ old. 
 
 
 
 Keper fed Ndiwa 
 
 with a botle. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One night, 
 
 everybody was 
 
 woken up 
 
 by the arival 
 
 of Ambia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ambia was five 
 
 months’ old. 
 
 
 
 She was weak 
 
 after her long 
 
 journey. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Because of her 
 
 long neck, 
 
 Keper held 
 
 the botle high 
 
 to fed Ambia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The last orphans 
 
 to arive that month 
 
 were thre hungry 
 
 cubs. 
 
 
 
 Their names were 
 
 Kopi, Kepi and Keji. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Keper and his helpers love 
 
 al of the animals. Even the 
 
 naughty ones. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The people at the 
 
 nursery work hard. 
 
 
 
 They hope that 
 
 one day the orphans 
 
 can lok after themselves. 
 
 
 
 Then these animals 
 
 
 can return to the wild.
